subject: [Ip-health] New Peru/Panama text
body:
The text incorporating the conceptual agreements for revision to the
Peru-Panama trade agreements is now available. This is the link for the
Peru IP chapter. The rest is also available at ustr.gov

http://www.ustr.gov/assets/Trade_Agreements/Bilateral/Peru_TPA/Final_Texts/asset_upload_file692_9546.pdf

On first glance, this text for better and worse appears to have
maintained the key features and ambiguities of the concept paper.
_______________________________________________
Ip-health mailing list
Ip-health@lists.essential.org
http://lists.essential.org/mailman/listinfo/ip-health
